page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: Mr.Adlard's farm is arable covering 300 acres.The soil is heavy boulder clay and it has to be well_drained into a deep drainage dyke.He grows wheat for bread,barley for malt and beer,rape for margarine and cooking oil,beans(high in protein)for animal feed and for German sausages and grass and clover for silage for a neighbour's cows.The crop rotation is break crops(grass,beans or rape)wheat and barley.The break crops stop any cereal disease,put nitrogen into the soil and breaks it up.He employs only one part_time man.His machinery consists of a combine-harvester,drags, tractors,seed-drills,ploughs,harrows, and rollers.He has corn bins to condition the grain by blown air.He uses liquid fertiliser containing nitrogen potash and phosphates and purchase fresh seed every three years.
